title: Average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Average attendance, about 61142.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Average attendance about 60368.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
